Package br.com.armange.commons.thread

Utility package for thread creation.
  • ThreadUtil

    Useful structure for handling the current thread.

     ThreadUtil.sleepUnchecked(1000);
 final URL url = sleepUnchecked.getCurrentThreadResource("path");
 final InputStream is = ThreadUtil.getCurrentThreadResourceAsStream("path");
  • ThreadBuilder

    Useful structure for thread creation

     final ExecutorService thread = ThreadBuilder
          .newBuilder() //New object to build a new thread.
          .setTimeout(4000) //The thread will be canceled after four seconds.
          .setAfterExecuteConsumer(afterExecuteConsumer) //A consumer will be called after thread execution.
          .setUncaughtExceptionConsumer(throwableConsumer) //A consumer will be called after any exception thrown.
          .start();
  • TryAsyncBuilder

    Useful structure for try-async operation creation

  • ThreadBuilder

    Useful structure for thread creation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CaughtExecutorThreadFactory Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    Consider to use ExceptionCatcherThreadFactory A thread-factory that sets some thread parameters if non-null: Name Priority Uncaught exception handler
    ExecutorResult Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    Consider to use ExecutorResult A bean that wrappes a thread result, composed by a ExecutorService, a Future list and another ExecutorResult list for timeouted threads.
    The ExecutorResult list will be present when some thread has a timeout.
    One Future will be present by each thread started.
    Consider seeing the logical relationship between ExecutorService and Future in their respective documentation.
    ScheduledCaughtExecutorService Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    Consider to use ScheduledThreadBuilderExecutor A ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor that can additionally perform actions after thread has completed normally.
    ThreadBuilder Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    Consider to use ThreadBuilder Useful structure for thread creation in the following scenarios: Timeout
    ThreadUtil Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    Consider to use ThreadUtil Useful structure for handling the current segment.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UncheckedException Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    Consider to use UncheckedException Unchecked exceptions can be thrown instead of the RuntimeException option to release the handling of exceptions when they do not need to be handled.
